name: Viaje Astral Definitive edition
description: The game "astral travel" is an environment with an ideal suspense to face the challenges proposed there, the player can walk and jump, he has to pass obstacles such as floating boxes, rocks rolling down the hill, a moving bridge, puzzles, a witch that follows him and in addition to everything, if he fails at something, he goes back in time with a very funny and interesting animation; the style of the stage is gloomy and the level of difficulty to pass the obstacles while being followed by the witch is perfect to build the pressure on the player. The theme of the game deals with taking the Yagé, something unusual in the world of video games which makes it more striking since its main character enters a trance, his shaman warns him that something went wrong and he must overcome all barriers to wake up and not be trapped in your own mind.
